0: assert siegfried("text with ci, ce, ph, and ch", "This is a science project with photography and chicken") == "This is a sienss projekt vit fotografy and chicken"
assert siegfried("text with wh, w and th", "What will he think about the weather") == "Vat vil he zink about ze vezer"
assert siegfried("text with trailing e", "The apple is in the tree") == "Ze appl is in ze tree"
assert siegfried(5, "I would be speaking in a charming way") == "I vould be speakink in a charming vay"
assert siegfried("text with double letters", "I like to see the trees and have fun") == "I lik to se threz and haf fun"
assert siegfried(1, "Cinderella went to the castle") == "Sinderella vent to ze kasle"
assert siegfried(3, "She had a little cat") == "She had a litl kat"
assert siegfried(4, "What do we do with a drunken sailor?") == "Vhat do ve do viz a drunken sailor?"
1: assert siegfried(3, "He's going to the cinema tonight") == "He's going to ze sinema tonite"
assert siegfried(3, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps over ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(3, "She sells sea shells by the sea shore") == "She sells sea shells by ze sea shore"
assert siegfried(3, "Peter is a cat with a coat") == "Peter is a kat viz a kot"
assert siegfried(3, "I love to watch the show") == "I love to vatc ze sho"
assert siegfried(3, "She sings and dances") == "She sinks un dances"
assert siegfried(3, "They think they are winning") == "Zey zink zey are winnink"
assert siegfried(3, "What a wonderful world we live in") == "Vat a vunderful vorld ve live in"
2: assert siegfried(3, "They think they can win") == "Zey zink zey kan vin"
assert siegfried(3, "She will win and then play") == "She vil vin un zen play"
assert siegfried(3, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps over ze lazy dog"
assert siegfried(3, "This is a simple test case") == "Zis is a simpl test kase"
assert siegfried(3, "I love to watch the show") == "I love to vatc ze sho"
assert siegfried(3, "She sings and dances") == "She sinks un dances"
assert siegfried(3, "What are you doing here?") == "Vat are u doink here?"
assert siegfried(3, "The quick brown fox jumps") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps"
3: assert siegfried(3, "She will win and then play") == "She vil vin un zen play"
assert siegfried(3, "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog") == "Ze quick brown fox jumps over ze lazy dog"
